about_the_game:
Step into the world of SurvAIval, where survival meets automation! Gather resources, build your base, and bring it to life with the power of AI. Start small by crushing materials to earn money, but soon, your AI creations will handle the grind for you, freeing you to explore uncharted lands, conquer new territories, and forge alliances with those in need.

Expand your empire, meet the demands of new allies, and defend your base against relentless goblin raids. Will you rise as a master of automation and survival, or will the chaos of the world overtake you? The future of your base is in your hands!

Features

  • Gather, collect, and manage resources efficiently.

  • Create AIs to assist you in your survival journey.

  • Build your base from the ground up and defend it against threats.

  • Unlock new areas to explore and expand your domain.

  • Level up and upgrade your skills.

  • Set your own goals and forge your unique path to success. Achieve whatever you aspire to!
